text: Belinsky () is a 1951 Soviet drama movie directed by Grigori Kozintsev.Легендарный хор имени Свешникова открывает программу к своему 80-летиюБелинский (1951) The movie is based on the life of Russian literary critic Vissarion Belinsky (1811–1848). It stars Sergei Kurilov, Aleksandr Borisov, and Georgy Vitsin. ==Actors== * Sergei Kurilov as Vissarion Belinsky * Aleksandr Borisov as Alexander Herzen * Georgy Vitsin as Nikolai Gogol * Yuri Lyubimov as Frolov * Yuri Tolubeyev as Mikhail Shchepkin * Vladimir Chestnokov as Nikolay Nekrasov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian biographical movies Category:Latvian movies Category:1951 drama movies Category:1950s biographical movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Kozintsev Category:Movies set in the 19th century
title: Belinsky (movie)
